title: Experienced Sales Agent
job_overview:
Experienced Sales Agent - Weight Loss Medications
Full-Time Position Available
About the Role
We are seeking a dynamic and experienced sales professional to join our team selling weight loss medications. This is a full-time position that requires dedication, excellent communication skills, and a proven track record in sales.
Key Requirements
Proven Sales Experience: Must have demonstrated success in sales, preferably in healthcare, pharmaceuticals, or related industries
Excellent Communication: Perfect English speaking ability with clear articulation and professional phone presence
Script Adherence: Ability to follow provided scripts while maintaining a natural, personable conversation style
Multitasking Skills: Ability to manage multiple client interactions while maintaining attention to detail
Persuasive Abilities: Strong capability to build rapport and guide clients through the sales process
Confidence: Self-assured professional demeanor with the ability to handle objections effectively
Position Details
Schedule: 8-hour shifts, Monday through Sunday (weekends required)
Employment Type: Full-time position
Compensation: Competitive hourly wage plus commission on each successful sale
What We're Looking For
The ideal candidate will be a results-driven professional who thrives in a fast-paced environment. You should be comfortable discussing health and wellness products with potential clients and have the ability to close sales consistently.
Benefits
Base hourly pay
Performance-based commission structure
Full-time employment stability
Opportunity for career growth
Ready to take your sales career to the next level?
How to Apply
If you're interested in this position, please send an email that includes:
Your resume highlighting sales experience and achievements
A video introduction of yourself covering:
Personal introduction
Your relevant sales experience
Two specific reasons why you would be a good fit for this position
One of our HR managers will review your application and reach out if we feel you're a good match for our team.
